name: Golden Light
description:
"There is no god, yet."
Golden Light is a first-person procedural survival horror game with rogue-like elements and an eerie atmosphere.
Explore the dark enviroment of the Golden Light office, uncover the grim truth behind it's working spaces, fight the unthinkable.
What's coming on release:
Procedurally generated enviroments with interesting events to scare or help you on your way.Deep narrative and interesting main story.Plenty of firearm options.Visuals and atmosphere inspired by all of our favorite horror games.Original soundtrack
